mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper(paper_id, name, uuid_name, original_name, paper_directory_id, real_directory_name, subject, publish_Year, status, region, paper_from, paper_type, description, created_time) VALUES(#{paperId}, #{name}, #{uuidName}, #{originalName}, #{paperDirectoryId}, #{realDirectoryName}, #{subject}, #{publishYear}, #{status}, #{region}, #{paperFrom}, #{paperType}, #{description}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE paper_directory_id=#{paperDirectoryId}, real_directory_name=#{realDirectoryName}
